name: coffee bean

info.description: Plant in spring or summer to grow a coffee plant. Place five beans in a keg to make coffee.

notes: Has a 1% chance to drop from dust sprite

name: blueberry

info.description: A popular berry reported to have many health benefits. The blue skin has the highest nutrient concentration.

notes: Has a small chance for multiple fruit from each harvest

info.description: One of the most popular grains. The sweet, fresh cobs are a summer favorite.

name: hot pepper

info.description: Fiery hot with a hint of sweetness.

notes: Has a small chance for multiple fruit from each harvest

name: cranberries

info.description: These tart red berries are a traditional winter food.

notes: Harvest gives two Cranberries and has a small chance to provide more
